articles.title: Indian education sector’s budget wishlist – Subsidised access to laptops and smartphones, focus on edtech - Business Insider India
articles.description: India’s Union Budget 2022 is expected to focus more on the learning loss due to COVID-19, and the implementation of the new National Educational Policy. Last
